text: Špiro Guberina (1 March 1933 – 27 November 2020) was a Croatian actor. He was born in Šibenik, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. His career began in 1957. He was known for his roles as Marko in The Secret of an Old Attic (1984), Stari in Agonija (1998) and as the Priest in The Last Will (2001). Guberina died on 27 November 2020 in Zagreb, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Croatian actors
title: Špiro Guberina
